hypothesis_content.title: Political Memecoin (TRUMP) Decoupling During BTC Consolidation
hypothesis_content.statement: During BTC consolidation periods (BTC 5-day price range < 3% of current price) in NEUTRAL/BEAR regimes, political memecoins (TRUMP, BODEN) will decouple from crypto correlation and trade on political news flow, providing alpha opportunities via news sentiment momentum strategies independent of BTC moves.
hypothesis_content.rationale: During low-volatility periods in core crypto, attention shifts to narrative-driven assets. Political memecoins have distinct fundamental drivers (polls, debates, policy announcements) that dominate price action when crypto-specific volatility is low, creating temporary decoupling.
entry_conditions: Political news sentiment score (proprietary feed) shows >0.5 standard deviation move

exit_conditions.take_profit: TRUMP absolute return reaches +15% from entry
exit_conditions.stop_loss: TRUMP absolute return reaches -8% from entry OR BTC breaks consolidation with >2% move
exit_conditions.time_exit: When BTC 5-day range expands above 4% (consolidation ends)

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: TRUMP maintains high correlation (>0.6) with BTC during consolidation periods despite political news events in >70% of instances.
